actions.committee: Committee on Finance under authority of the order of the Senate of 02/14/2008
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance under authority of the order of the Senate of 02/14/2008.

official_title: A bill to provide relief for veterans with a disability rated as total.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt veterans with a disability rated as total from the tax on social security benefits. Requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) to amend federal housing regulations to exclude the disability and pension benefits of veterans with a disability rated as total from income for purposes of determining eligibility for certain public housing programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide relief for veterans with a disability rated as total.
